name: ipc.client.connect.timeout
description:
Indicates the number of milliseconds a client will wait for the
               socket to establish a server connection.

name: ha.zookeeper.session-timeout.ms
description:
The session timeout to use when the ZKFC connects to ZooKeeper.
    Setting this value to a lower value implies that server crashes
    will be detected more quickly, but risks triggering failover too
    aggressively in the case of a transient error or network blip.

name: dfs.webhdfs.netty.low.watermark
description: Low watermark configuration to Netty for Datanode WebHdfs.

name: dfs.namenode.name.cache.threshold
description:
Frequently accessed files that are accessed more times than this
    threshold are cached in the FSDirectory nameCache.

name: dfs.namenode.replication.max-streams-hard-limit
description: Hard limit for all replication streams.

name: mapreduce.jobhistory.jobname.limit
description: Number of characters allowed for job name in Job History Server web page.

name: dfs.storage.policy.satisfier.retry.max.attempts
description:
Max retry to satisfy the block storage policy. After this retry block will be removed
    from the movement needed queue.
